item.title: Curriculum Vitae
item.description: Employment History IT Frankfurt GmbH | Senior Consultant, Full Stack Developer January 2021 – September 2021 IT Frankfurt GmbH provides individual software solutions and practical consulting. Tasks and Responsibilities Development of an internal „Enterprise Architecture Plattform“ for a major german bank Consulting and implementation of architectural decisions Supervision and training of new employees and (student) trainees Technologies Backend: Java, Spring Boot, Maven, Liquibase, JUnit Frontend: React, Javascript / Typescript, Jest, Html5 Misc: Json, Rest, MySql, Git Tools: Figma, Bitbucket, Jira, Confluence, VSCode, IntelliJ ZweiAcht GmbH | Co-Founder, CTO, Senior Full Stack Developer Mai 2018 – September 2021
item.content:
Employment History

IT Frankfurt GmbH | Senior Consultant, Full Stack Developer

January 2021 – September 2021

IT Frankfurt GmbH provides individual software solutions and practical consulting.

Tasks and Responsibilities

  • Development of an internal „Enterprise Architecture Plattform“ for a major german bank
  • Consulting and implementation of architectural decisions
  • Supervision and training of new employees and (student) trainees

Technologies

  • Backend: Java, Spring Boot, Maven, Liquibase, JUnit
  • Frontend: React, Javascript / Typescript, Jest, Html5
  • Misc: Json, Rest, MySql, Git
  • Tools: Figma, Bitbucket, Jira, Confluence, VSCode, IntelliJ

ZweiAcht GmbH | Co-Founder, CTO, Senior Full Stack Developer

Mai 2018 – September 2021

ZweiAcht develops modern cloud based practice management software for dentists.

Tasks and Responsibilities

  • Customer centric requirement analysis and coordination
  • Planning and implementation of fullstack application (Frontend / Backend / Desktop Client)
  • Creation of Ui / Ux designs and alignment with customers
  • Research and development of legal requirements for settlement with health insurances

Technologies

  • Backend: Java, Spring Boot, Gradle, Liquibase, JUnit
  • Frontend: Angular, Javascript / Typescript, Jest, RxJs, NgRX, Html5, Angular Material
  • Desktop Client / Companion: Electron, Golang (CGO / C )
  • Misc: Kubernetes, Docker, Helm, Json, Rest, MySql, Git
  • Tools: Figma, Excel, Gitlab, Photoshop, Illustrator, Jira, Confluence, VSCode, IntelliJ

Maxon Computer | GPU-Rendering Specialist

MÄRZ 2016 – APRIL 2018

Maxon Computer is a leading developer of 3D software for the creative industries, best known for its flagship 3D modeling, painting, rendering, and animation software, Cinema 4D.

Tasks and Responsibilities

  • Development of a physically-based GPU rendering engine (Radeon ProRender)
    • In Cooperation with AMD and Apple
  • Partial project lead for the integration in Cinema 4D
    • Setup build processes and tests
    • Architecural planning, requirement analysis and cost estimation
    • Coordination between companies
  • Technical support for product management
    • prioritization of upcoming releases
    • planning of new features
  • Examine the feasibility of new research work and ideas

Technologies

  • DCC: C / C++, Perforce
  • Rendering Engine: OpenCL, OpenGL, Metal, C, Python, Git
  • Tools: Jira, Confluence, Photoshop, Visual Studio

Education

Master of Science

Karlsruhe Institut of Technology (2012 – 2015)

Final Grade: 1,3

Specialization

  • Computer Graphics
  • Parallel Programming

Thesis

  • Efficient Screenspace Distribution of Irradiance Cache Records by Analyzing and Evaluating Existing Error Metrics (1,0)

Bachelor of Science

Karlsruhe Institut of Technology (2008 – 2012)

Final Grade: 1,6

Specialization

  • Computer Graphics
  • Cryptography and Security

Thesis

  • Visibility Caching for Progressive Many-Light Algorithms

Publications

Progressive Visibility Caching for Fast Indirect Illumination

Proceedings of International Workshop on Vision, Modeling, and Visualization | (VMV 2013) | Lugano (Schweiz)

  • Main author and presentor of the paper
    • Co-Authors: Jan Novak, Hauke Rehfeld, Carsten Dachsbacher
  • Follow up work to bachelor thesis on visibility caching

Student Assistant

Karlsruhe Institut of Technology

September 2009 – December 2015

Steinbuch Centre for Computing (SCC)

Misc

Sprachen

  • German: Mother tongue
  • English: Business fluent

Hobbies

  • Snowboarding
  • LEDs <3
    • see projects
  • Travelling
  • Gamejams
